criteria: All Sprint 1 E2E tests passing in CI; >85% backend unit test coverage; No critical accessibility violations on deployed pages.
success_metrics: User can successfully log in and perform a basic calculation in the staging environment.

criteria: Integration tests for multi-user data isolation are passing; All API endpoints documented in OpenAPI spec; No data corruption observed during manual testing of history/custom mode creation.
success_metrics: User data is securely persisted and isolated per user account.

criteria: Manual security review of `isolated-vm` Lambda handler is complete and approved; P95 latency for formula execution is <500ms under load test; Offline sync E2E test passes 5 consecutive runs without flaking.
success_metrics: Custom mode execution is deemed secure; Offline sync is reliable; Performance NFRs are met.
